author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Markus M. May "Add some directories and files to .gitignore" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4685

f using git, some files are still added to an commit, even though, they should not appear in a commit. Some of those are most probably because of a directory renaming (jackrabbit -> jcr). Some others are jedit/emacs/vi artefacts (*~).
